TopicTitle: Is there a way to pause the game?

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to pause the game, so I can take my time adjusting maneuver nodes? Hitting ESC brings up the menu and I can't adjust my nodes. 

Or is there a way to pre-program a flight path?

4 minutes ago, SpaceFaringOrBust said:

Is there a way to pause the game, so I can take my time adjusting maneuver nodes?

No, but there really needs to be.  I can't tell you how many times I've been fine tuning a node when it just up and switches to the orbit selection mode because my stupid ship passed it.

5 minutes ago, SpaceFaringOrBust said:

Is there a way to pause the game, so I can take my time adjusting maneuver nodes? Hitting ESC brings up the menu and I can't adjust my nodes. 

Or is there a way to pre-program a flight path?

 

No, but things tend to happen in the game at a pace that you should be able to get all your planning done with plenty of time to spare, except in very specific circumstances that you'd need to set up, and could just avoid.
You can "pause", but only for taking pictures I'm afraid... Press escape and then f2. It'll remove the hud, now you can move the camera freely. But you can't select parts or orbits.
